lines.text: [Calvert comes in covered in mud and blood, having been beaten up]
I met a wild gypsy girl in the heather.
[Uncle Arthur is discussing the work involved in dealing with the bullion robbers]
the Admiralty, the Government, the Americans... and the insurance assessors. Grubby little men with gabardine raincoats and dandruff.
Well I don't have dandruff, Sir, if it's any consolation.
Yes, I don't think you need demonstrate your questionable attitude to authority *quite* so early.
[Uncle Arthur staggers out of a cabin, looking very seasick]
Boats would be wonderful... if only one didn't have to go to sea in them.
